meta.track_condition: Dirt: Fast, Turf: Firm, Tapeta: Fast

selections.name: Apache One Six
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. takes the mount for Diane Morici. Posted a solid 102 Speed Figure in last outing and has shown ability to handle the distance. Prime contender in this Maiden Claiming field.

selections.name: Antonino
selections.reason: Consistent speed figures (102) and retains David Egan. Despite the wide post, the horse has the tactical speed to work out a trip.

selections.name: I Wanna Be Me
selections.reason: Boasts the highest speed figure in the field (114) from a previous effort. If he can replicate that form, he is a major player.

selections.name: Tybee Echo
selections.reason: Solid recent form with a 105 speed figure. Rajiv Maragh aboard is a positive.

danger_horse.name: I Wanna Be Me
danger_horse.reason: Highest speed figure ceiling in the group makes him a threat if he fires.

selections.name: Vekoma Velocity
selections.reason: Significant class drop from MCL25000 to MCL12500. Irad Ortiz Jr. rides for George Weaver, a high-percentage combo. Speed figure of 90 fits well here.

selections.name: If I Can Dream
selections.reason: Saffie Joseph trainee with a 99 speed figure. Should be competitive at this level.

selections.name: Rebellution
selections.reason: Another Saffie Joseph runner with Gaffalione. Posted a 99 speed figure recently and drops into a winnable spot.

selections.name: Don't Go Astray
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 91 speed figure. Can hit the board.

danger_horse.name: If I Can Dream
danger_horse.reason: Joseph barn is dangerous in these lower level maiden claimers.

selections.name: Drum Roll
selections.reason: Coming off a win with a massive 119 speed figure. Edwin Gonzalez retains the mount. Looks superior on paper.

selections.name: Highway Harmony
selections.reason: Classy runner dropping in for a tag. Edgard Zayas/Jorge Abreu team is lethal on turf. Speed 112.

selections.name: World Traveler
selections.reason: Gaffalione rides. Consistent speed figures (117) and should be closing late.

selections.name: More Than Glory
selections.reason: Solid 115 speed figure puts her in the mix for the exotics.

danger_horse.name: Highway Harmony
danger_horse.reason: Back class makes her the main threat to the top pick.

selections.name: Snowyte
selections.reason: Class of the field. G1 placed (2nd in Frizette). Speed 106. Irad Ortiz Jr. aboard. Should handle this allowance field easily.

selections.name: Clairita
selections.reason: Impressive maiden winner in the slop with a 101 speed figure. Junior Alvarado/Philip Bauer combo.

selections.name: Heavenly Sunset
selections.reason: Brad Cox/Gaffalione entry. Won maiden at Keeneland with a 105 speed figure. Very dangerous.

selections.name: Puckered
selections.reason: Experienced runner but faces a steep class hike against these promising fillies.

danger_horse.name: Clairita
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced with high potential and speed.

selections.name: Miss Candy Girl
selections.reason: Drops from MSW to Maiden Claiming. Castellano/D'Angelo team. Speed 100 is competitive.

selections.name: Bella's Breeze
selections.reason: Consistent runner hitting the board recently. Speed 97. Logical contender.

selections.name: Fierce Fairshinda
selections.reason: Torres rides. Speed 94. Should be involved early.

selections.name: Velvet Rage
selections.reason: Has shown flashes of speed (104). Dangerous if she puts it all together.

danger_horse.name: Bella's Breeze
danger_horse.reason: Consistency at this level makes her a safe bet to hit the board.

selections.name: Perfect Shances
selections.reason: John Velazquez rides for Carlos David. Speed 101. Looks poised for a big effort.

selections.name: Jayana
selections.reason: Speed 104. Edgar Perez rides. Consistent form.

selections.name: Shesinamood
selections.reason: Highest recent speed figure (110) but form is erratic. Dangerous if right.

selections.name: Majestuosa
selections.reason: Speed 99. Can pick up pieces if pace collapses.

danger_horse.name: Shesinamood
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 110 is best in field, must be respected.

selections.name: Paris Surprise
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. rides for Nolan Ramsey. Speed 116. Strong class and connections.

selections.name: Patrick's Promise
selections.reason: Speed 110. Trombetta barn. Solid contender.

selections.name: Yankee Drummer
selections.reason: Speed 119 is tops, but form is inconsistent. Dangerous speed threat.

selections.name: Cognoscenti
selections.reason: Gaffalione/Dubb. Speed 116. Rail draw helps.

danger_horse.name: Yankee Drummer
danger_horse.reason: If he clears early, that 119 speed figure makes him hard to catch.

selections.name: Augustinian
selections.reason: Mark Casse trainee with a blistering 116 speed figure. The one to catch.

selections.name: Win N Juice
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz Jr. aboard. Speed 112. Will be stalking the top pick.

selections.name: Squire
selections.reason: David Egan/Biancone. Speed 109. Consistent.

selections.name: Ababajoni
selections.reason: Speed 118 is high, but class test here. Exotic filler.

danger_horse.name: Win N Juice
danger_horse.reason: Irad Ortiz factor and strong speed figures.

selections.name: Operation Torch
selections.reason: Speed 119. Drops in class. Jorge Ruiz/James Toner. Looks like a standout.

selections.name: Fly Erik Fly
selections.reason: Speed 114. Consistent runner who fits well here.

selections.name: Human Desire
selections.reason: Gaffalione rides. Speed 103. First start as gelding could improve form.

selections.name: Mister Monoclonal
selections.reason: Velazquez rides. Speed 104. Chance for a share.

danger_horse.name: Fly Erik Fly
danger_horse.reason: Solid speed figures make him the main alternative to the favorite.

selections.name: Espouse
selections.reason: Speed 106. Consistent form in Argentina. Top selection.

selections.name: Luna Curiosa
selections.reason: Speed 103. Good recent form.

selections.name: Full Serenity
selections.reason: Speed 104. Competitive at this level.

selections.name: Sanaa Springs
selections.reason: Speed 102. Exotic possibility.

selections.name: Intillano
selections.reason: Speed 113. Looks fastest in this simulcast field.

selections.name: Sismico Might
selections.reason: Speed 108. Main danger.

selections.name: El Sueno
selections.reason: Speed 100. Consistent.

selections.name: Acireale
selections.reason: Speed 100. Rail draw.

selections.name: Don Charola
selections.reason: Speed 117 stands out significantly in this field.

selections.name: Don Leucadio
selections.reason: Speed 98. Best of the rest.

selections.name: El Bandido
selections.reason: Speed 117 (tied with top pick). Must be respected.

selections.name: Gran Mingo
selections.reason: Speed 96. Exotic filler.

danger_horse.name: El Bandido
danger_horse.reason: Matches the top pick on speed figures.
